text: Caffiers is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de-France region of France. ==Geography== A farming village located 10 miles (16 km) south of Calais, on the D250 road. ==Population== ==Places of interest== * The church of St. Eloi, dating from the nineteenth century. ==Railways== *Gare de Caffiers on the Boulogne-Calais railway. ==See also== *Communes of the Pas-de- Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Caffiers
